Name: assign_worker_to_task
Description: Binary variable: 1 if worker w is assigned to task tsk, 0 otherwise.

Name: assign_user_story_to_sprint
Description: Binary variable: 1 if user story us is assigned to sprint sp, 0 otherwise.

Name: assign_team_to_project
Description: Binary variable: 1 if team t is assigned to project p, 0 otherwise.

Name: select_feature_for_release
Description: Binary variable: 1 if feature f is selected for release plan rep, 0 otherwise.

Name: set_sprint_start_date
Description: Integer variable representing the start date of sprint sp (e.g., as days from project start).

Name: set_task_effort
Description: Integer variable for the effort (e.g., in hours) assigned to task tsk.

Name: set_user_story_priority
Description: Integer variable for the priority of user story us.

Name: resolve_blocker
Description: Binary variable: 1 if blocker bl is resolved, 0 otherwise.

Name: assign_scrum_master_to_team
Description: Binary variable: 1 if Scrum Master sm is assigned to team t, 0 otherwise.

Name: assign_product_owner_to_project
Description: Binary variable: 1 if Product Owner po is assigned to project p, 0 otherwise.

Name: set_sprint_duration
Description: Integer variable for the duration of sprint sp in days.

Name: link_task_to_story
Description: Binary variable: 1 if task tsk is part of user story us, 0 otherwise.
